sys_ui_message.message: 1. On [Workday](https://wd3.myworkday.com/absa/d/home.htmld), click on the cloud icon at the top right of your screen then select your name/view profile. 2. On the left side of your screen, click on **Actions**. 3. Choose **Worker History**, followed by **Maintain Worker Documents**. 4. Click on **Add** and under **Drop Files**, select the files that you would like to attach. Then click on **OK** near the bottom left of your screen. 5. Click on **Done** near the bottom left of your screen when you have successfully added your document.
